thread.title: New Jersey town first in U.S. to use Uber to curb drunken driving
thread.title_full: New Jersey town first in U.S. to use Uber to curb drunken driving

title: New Jersey town first in U.S. to use Uber to curb drunken driving
text:
New Jersey town first in U.S. to use Uber to curb drunken driving 
Reuters Saturday 24th October, 2015 
NEW YORK Oct 23 A New Jersey town on track for 
a record-breaking number of drunken driving cases has become the 
first U.S. municipality to partner with ride service app Uber 
to keep inebriated residents from getting behind the 
wheel....
